sentences.sContent: Narouz clapped his hands and a servant entered.
sentences.sCn: 纳鲁兹拍了拍手，一名佣人走了进来。

sentences.sContent: Mandy laughed and clapped her hands in delight.
sentences.sCn: 曼迪笑了，高兴得拍起手来。

synos.tran: 拍手，鼓掌；轻轻拍打某人

words.tran: 拍手者；铃舌；响板；唠唠叨叨的嘴巴

trans.tranOther: if you clap your hands, you hit your hands together a few times to attract someone’s attention or to show that you are pleased

trans.tranCn: 拍； 击掌声； 霹雳声
trans.tranOther: the loud sound that you make when you hit your hands together many times to show that you enjoyed something
